mapper.select: SELECT o.horseStatus,o.id,o.orderNum as orderNum,st.storeName as storeName,st.storePhone as storePhone ,tu.realName as realName, tu.userPhone as userPhone,o.msg as msg,ad.address as address,o.orderStatus from t_order o , t_user tu , t_o_h oh , store st ,address ad where o.user_id = tu.id and oh.orderNum =o.orderNum and st.id = o.store_id and o.address_id = ad.id and oh.horseman_id = '1' and o.orderNum like '%${c.orderNum}%'

SELECT count(*) from t_order o , t_user tu , t_o_h oh , store st ,address ad where o.user_id = tu.id and oh.orderNum =o.orderNum and st.id = o.store_id and o.address_id = ad.id and oh.horseman_id = '1'
